homepage_quotes.author: Albert Einstein
homepage_quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

homepage_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
homepage_quotes.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

homepage_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
homepage_quotes.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.

homepage_quotes.author: Walt Disney
homepage_quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

homepage_quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
homepage_quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

homepage_quotes.author: Steve Jobs
homepage_quotes.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.

homepage_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
homepage_quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until itâ€™s done.

homepage_quotes.author: Mark Twain
homepage_quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
